access_control.title: Access Control (§164.312(a)(1))
access_control.description: Implement technical policies and procedures for electronic information systems that maintain ePHI to allow access only to authorized persons or software programs.

audit_controls.title: Audit Controls (§164.312(b))
audit_controls.description: Implement hardware, software, and/or procedural mechanisms that record and examine activity in information systems that contain or use ePHI.

integrity.title: Integrity (§164.312(c)(1))
integrity.description: Implement policies and procedures to protect ePHI from improper alteration or destruction.
remediation: Implement Pydantic models for data validation in presentation layer
Implement Unit of Work pattern in repositories for data integrity

transmission_security.title: Transmission Security (§164.312(e)(1))
transmission_security.description: Implement technical security measures to guard against unauthorized access to ePHI being transmitted over an electronic communications network.
remediation: Implement secure HTTP headers in middleware

phi_handling.title: PHI Handling
phi_handling.description: Proper handling of Protected Health Information throughout the application.
